projects.title: Kiblatku
projects.description: A compass-based mobile application made by team of 4 CS students designed to help users accurately determine the Qibla direction.

projects.title: Nextech
projects.description: An E-Commerce web application built with PHP with comprehensive shopping experience for users, a dashboard for administrators, and Midtrans integrated payment gateway for transactions.

projects.title: Skill Nova
projects.description: An Education mobile application built with Flutter with interactive learning experience for users, clear tabs for easy access, and real-time score update for each lessons done.

projects.title: NayAI
projects.description: An AI Image revealer built with Typescript in Vite framework by adding carefully designed color treatment inspired by professional photo editing workflows without any sliders and presets.
